oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-05-30 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from May 30, 1959. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Faron Young (host/performer), guest performers the Wilburn Brothers, and regular performers Boob Brasfield (Uncle Cyp), Tommy Jackson, Grandpa Jones, Minnie Pearl, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1025th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Uncle Cyp; Wilburn Brothers; Del Wood; Faron Young
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Faron Young introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Uncle Cyp) -- Prince Albert commercial (Minnie Pearl, Faron Young) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Faron Young introduces Wilburn Brothers -- I Love Everybody (Wilburn Brothers) -- Faron Young introduces Del Wood -- Whirl-A-Way (Del Wood) -- Grant Turner and Faron Young announce his tour schedule -- We're Talking It Over (Faron Young) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Faron Young) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Network announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States.
